comments:
Build:http://www.eclipse.org/tptp/home/downloads/drops/TPTP-4.2.1-200607310100.html
OS: Windows XP

Steps to reproduce:
1. Start workbench
2. Start rac without security on local machine
3. Set the following parameters:
set AC_DIR=<rac_home>
set PLUGINS_HOME=%AC_DIR%\plugins
set EXEFWRK=%PLUGINS_HOME%\org.eclipse.hyades.execution_<version>
set CLASSPATH=.;%EXEFWRK%\hexcore.jar;%EXEFWRK%\hexl.jar;%EXEFWRK%\hexr.jar
set PATH=%PATH%;%EXEFWRK%;%AC_DIR%\bin;%EXEFWRK%\os\win32\x86

4. execute "java TestProgram" (TestProgram and TestAgent will be attached to this bug)
5. Open the profiling perspective in your workbench
6. Create a new Attach configuration
7. Select localhost
8. Find the agent under the Agents tab
9. Click Profile

You will see an error saying:
An internal error occured during: "launching"

Here is the out put in the workbench .log file


java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.hyades.trace.ui.internal.launcher.ProfileAttachDelegate.launch(ProfileAttachDelegate.java:252)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:639)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.core.LaunchConfiguration.launch(LaunchConfiguration.java:565)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin.buildAndLaunch(DebugUIPlugin.java:754)
	at org.eclipse.debug.internal.ui.DebugUIPlugin$6.run(DebugUIPlugin.java:944)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)


However, if you click OK on the error dialog, the application behaves as it should.  The user will be allowed to attach to the agent and monitor it.
Reassigning to a more appropriate component.  This looks like a duplicate of https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=152745
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 152745 ***
*** Bug 151780 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
